default_messages.summarize_prompt: Can you summarize all these chat messages? These are previous memories that you, {char_name}, have experienced. Feel free to focus on details that are noteworthy or that you find interesting.

lore_default: Here is some information about the current topic from your lorebook;

rag_system.memory_intro: This message is a memory of an interaction you had, relevant to what is currently happening;
rag_system.memory_outro: This is the end of the memory!
rag_system.recalculating: Manual recalculation of RAG database. Give me some time...
